mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Polsley, Daniel
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont], Wheeling, Apl 25 1862. By Telegraph from Martinsburg 25 1862. The people here want you to make them a speech on Monday shall I appoint in your[last two words scratched out] an hour & what hour. I start to Fairmont today. Crothers & Samuels left for Wheeling yesterday D Polsley 32m116pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Polsley, Daniel
Martinsburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
